yaak.agent.communication.jmx
Class ChannelNotification

java.lang.Object
  java.util.EventObject
      javax.management.Notification
          yaak.agent.communication.jmx.ChannelNotification
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ChannelNotification
extends javax.management.Notification

ChannelNotification adds channel-related information to a notification.

Version:
$Id: ChannelNotification.java 6 2005-06-08 17:00:15Z jsmith $
Author:
Jerry Smith
